QuestData.Title: Nope Nope Nope
QuestData.Description: I recovered this weapon on a recent scouting run near the wall. It would seem ideal for helping your Shado-Pan with their infestation problem in Gurthani Terrace.$B$BThe more they are focused on keeping spiders off the wall, the less time they are killing fear-gripped swarmborn.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Shado-Pan Dragon Gun to destroy 20 Dreadspinner Eggs in Gurthani Terrace.
